img_above_text:
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(46\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/0e/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2846%29.png)
Go back down the stairs, and when you're almost at the bottom, look to the right to find another **Purple Lingzhi y** ou can harvest. Continue on, then turn right and follow the path.
img_below_text:
Watch out for the next Lavabat, and when you've tackled it, **don't head up the long set of stairs**. Instead, go to the left first. Take out the Revenant Archer and the Revenant that will emerge from the floor as you get close. When it's clear, head for the end of the path and turn right.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(45\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f4/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2845%29.png)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:

            Context:

Go back down the stairs, and when you're almost at the bottom, look to the right to find another **Purple Lingzhi y** ou can harvest. Continue on, then turn right and follow the path."
            - Following Text: "Watch out for the next Lavabat, and when you've tackled it, **don't head up the long set of stairs**. Instead, go to the left first. Take out the Revenant Archer and the Revenant that will emerge from the floor as you get close. When it's clear, head for the end of the path and turn right.
![Woods Ember Walkthrough \(45\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/f/f4/Woods_Ember_Walkthrough_%2845%29.png)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a dark, rocky path leading up to a set of stairs with a small structure at the top. The scene is shrouded in a gloomy atmosphere, with twisted trees and rugged terrain. The red arrow in the image suggests a direction to follow, indicating a narrative progression in the game walkthrough. The preceding text advises players to look to the right for a Purple Lingzhi before continuing on the path, while the following text warns of a Lavabat encounter and suggests taking a left turn instead of heading up the stairs. The image serves to guide players through this specific section of the game, highlighting the path and upcoming challenges.
